# LLMs.txt - Mrs. Tomei Grooms Cats
# This file helps AI systems understand and navigate this website
# Last updated: 2025-12-09

## About This Business

Mrs. Tomei Grooms Cats is a professional cat grooming service operated by a Certified Feline Master Groomer (CFMG). We specialize exclusively in feline grooming, providing stress-free experiences for cats in a dog-free environment.

## Service Locations

Primary Location: East York/Toronto, Ontario, Canada
- Address: 634 Glebeholme Blvd, Toronto, ON M4C 1V3
- Phone: (416) 270-1884
- Email: bellasalsera@hotmail.com

Secondary Location: Windsor, Ontario, Canada
- Address: Parent and Erie, Windsor, ON N9A 2E5
- Service Areas: Tecumseh, St. Clair Beach, Puce, Belle River

## Services Offered

> Standard Cat Groom
Brushing, de-shedding, nail trim, ear cleaning, and sanitary trim.
Price: $50-$85 (in-studio) | $60-$85 (mobile)

> Lion Cut
Full-body clip leaving a mane around the head and pom on the tail.
Price: Starting at $75

> Comb Cut (Teddy Bear)
Even trim all over for a plush, teddy bear appearance.
Price: Starting at $70

> Nail Services
Nail trims and Soft Paws (nail caps) application.
Price: $25-$60

> Bath & Blow Dry
Deep cleaning with cat-safe shampoo and professional blow dry.
Price: Starting at $60

> Add-On Services
Paw pad trim, belly trim, de-matting, sanitary trim.
Price: $8-$25

## Key Differentiators

1. CFMG Certified - Highest level of feline grooming certification
2. Cat-Only Specialist - 100% focused on feline care, no dogs
3. Mobile House Calls - Grooming at your doorstep, less stress for cats
4. Dual Locations - Serving both Toronto/East York and Windsor areas

## Pricing Quick Reference

In-Studio:
- Nail trims: $25+ (first cat), $10 each additional
- Standard groom: $50-$75

Mobile House Calls:
- Nail trims: $40+ (first cat), $10 each additional
- Standard groom: $60-$85

Email: bellasalsera@hotmail.com
